question: Which organizations have 'Accenture' as an investor?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)<-[:HAS_INVESTOR]-(investor:Organization {name: 'Accenture'})
RETURN o.name AS organization, o.summary AS summary
error: Schema mismatch - organizations cannot be investors, only persons can

question: Identify organizations that are both suppliers and investors to other organizations.
error: Schema mismatch - organizations cannot be investors, only persons can

question: Which organizations have foreign investors (investors from a different country)?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(:City)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(c1:Country),
      (o)<-[:HAS_INVESTOR]-(investor:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(:City)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(c2:Country)
WHERE c1 <> c2
RETURN o.name AS organization, c1.name AS organization_country,
       investor.name AS investor, c2.name AS investor_country
error: Schema mismatch - organizations cannot be investors, only persons can

question: List the organizations that are investors in more than one other organization.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_INVESTOR]->(investor:Organization)
WITH investor, count(o) as num_investments
WHERE num_investments > 1
RETURN investor.name as investor_name, num_investments
error: Schema mismatch - organizations cannot be investors, only persons can

question: List organizations that have a philanthropic foundation as an investor.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_INVESTOR]->(investor:Organization)
WHERE investor.name CONTAINS 'Foundation'
RETURN o.name AS organization, investor.name AS investor
error: Schema mismatch - organizations cannot be investors, only persons can

question: Identify the first 3 organizations that have the same investor and are competitors.
cypher:
MATCH (o1:Organization)-[:HAS_INVESTOR]->(investor)<-[:HAS_INVESTOR]-(o2:Organization)
WHERE (o1)-[:HAS_COMPETITOR]->(o2)
RETURN o1.name AS Org1, o2.name AS Org2, investor.name AS CommonInvestor
LIMIT 3
error: Schema mismatch - organizations cannot be investors, only persons can

question: Identify the first 3 organizations that have the same investor and are based in 'Italy'.
cypher:
MATCH (o1:Organization)-[:HAS_INVESTOR]->(investor)<-[:HAS_INVESTOR]-(o2:Organization)
WHERE o1 <> o2 AND o1.id < o2.id
  AND (o1)-[:IN_CITY]->(:City)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(:Country {name: 'Italy'})
  AND (o2)-[:IN_CITY]->(:City)-[:IN_COUNTRY]->(:Country {name: 'Italy'})
RETURN o1.name AS org1, o2.name AS org2, investor.name AS investor
LIMIT 3
error: Schema mismatch - organizations cannot be investors, only persons can

question: What are the names of the first 3 organizations that are investors in other organizations?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_INVESTOR]->(investor:Organization)
RETURN DISTINCT investor.name
LIMIT 3

question: Name the first 3 organizations that are headquartered in cities with more than 5 million inhabitants.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City)
WHERE c.population > 5000000
RETURN o.name
LIMIT 3
error: Schema mismatch - city entity does not have population attribute

question: List the names of the cities where the headquarters of the first 5 organizations founded before 1950 are located.
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City)
WHERE o.foundingDate < date('1950-01-01')
RETURN c.name
LIMIT 5
error: Schema mismatch - organization entity does not have foundingDate attribute

question: Which 3 organizations are the most frequent collaborators in joint ventures?
cypher:
MATCH (o1:Organization)-[:HAS_SUBSIDIARY|HAS_SUPPLIER|HAS_INVESTOR]-(o2:Organization)
WITH o1, o2, count(*) as collaborations
ORDER BY collaborations DESC
RETURN o1.name, o2.name, collaborations
LIMIT 3
error: Schema mismatch - organizations cannot be investors, only persons can

question: Which 3 organizations have the longest history of continuous operation according to their founding dates in the database?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)
WHERE o.foundingDate IS NOT NULL
RETURN o.name AS organization, o.foundingDate AS founded
ORDER BY o.foundingDate
LIMIT 3
error: Schema mismatch - organization entity does not have foundingDate attribute

question: Which 3 organizations have the most patents filed according to the database?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)
WHERE o.nbrPatents IS NOT NULL
RETURN o.name, o.nbrPatents
ORDER BY o.nbrPatents DESC
LIMIT 3
error: Schema mismatch - organization entity does not have nbrPatents attribute

question: Which organizations are based in a city with a population less than 100,000?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:IN_CITY]->(c:City)
WHERE c.population < 100000

question: Which organizations have CEOs who have been in their position for less than 3 years?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)-[:HAS_CEO]->(p:Person)
WHERE p.startDate IS NOT NULL AND duration.between(p.startDate, date()).years < 3
RETURN o.name AS organization, p.name AS ceo
error: Schema mismatch - person entity does not have startDate attribute

question: Name the organizations that have made the most investments in startups.
cypher:
MATCH (investor:Organization)-[r:HAS_INVESTOR]->(company:Organization)
WITH investor, count(r) AS num_investments
ORDER BY num_investments DESC
LIMIT 10
RETURN investor.name AS investor, num_investments

question: Which 3 organizations have the oldest founding dates?
cypher:
MATCH (o:Organization)
WHERE o.foundingDate IS NOT NULL

ORDER BY o.foundingDate

question: What are the 3 latest investments made by organizations in the software industry?
cypher:
MATCH (investor:Organization)-[:HAS_CATEGORY]->(:IndustryCategory {name: 'Software'})-[:HAS_INVESTOR]->(company:Organization)
MATCH (article:Article)-[:MENTIONS]->(company)
WHERE article.date IS NOT NULL
RETURN investor.name AS Investor, company.name AS Company, article.title AS Article, article.date AS Date
ORDER BY article.date DESC
LIMIT 3

RETURN i.name as investor, num_investments
ORDER BY num_investments DESC
